custom_steps_separated.content:
When the HR Derby end time has passed 
*Developer needs to configure this time
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN The All Star Game event module will appear in the ballpark guide page of all star game venue

custom_steps_separated.content: When looking in the All Star Game event detail page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The user should see:
The logos for the AL and NL team
The day, date, and time of the game 
The time zone should be the time zone of the ASG venue

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the event detail page of the All Star Game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see a link for At Bat
AND tapping on the link will take you to Gameday in At Bat for the All Star Game

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the event detail page of the All Star Game
And there is an offer(s) available for the game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see a 'Check In Offers' section
AND there will be offers available in that section

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user views the All Star Game anywhere in Ballpark
(Ballpark Guide - Upcoming Events, Event Details, Native Schedule, Native Schedule Event Details; Ticket Dashboard - Home Events lists, Ticket List, Your Upcoming Events + Ticket Scan view [require tickets])
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the start time will be displayed with the timezone of the hosting venue and uses the expected NL and AL logos

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user checks into the All Star game
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is able to successfully check in and view the entry in the Journal (both on main view and event details - all team names and logos appear normally)

custom_steps_separated.content: When we have reached the non-event end date/time
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN we will see the ballpark guide event module flip to the next event or All Star Game(depending on what is next)

*Ask developer to set up the All Star Sunday and HR Derby end times to test this
